Entity.Description: This table stores the work area definition for each user group. Work area is the set of locations, consisting of the zone and aisle combination within which a set of users work. The system suggests tasks originating and terminating only in these areas.
Entity.Name: User_Zone

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_USER_ZONE table.
Attribute.Name: User_Zone_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this user zone.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The data security group key that is associated with this user zone.
Attribute.Name: Data_Security_Group_Key

Attribute.Description: The field indicates the zone identifier for this user group that carries out the tasks.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the aisle number the user currently works in.
Attribute.Name: Aisle

Attribute.Description: This field indicates whether the work area record applies to the source or the target locations zone and aisle combination. Valid values are: Option 01: Indicates that the work area record applies to the Source Zone and Aisle. Option 02: Indicates that the work area record applies to the Target Zone and Aisle.
Attribute.Name: Record_Type

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the actual location of the shipment or container in the cart.
Entity.Name: Batch_Location

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_BATCH_LOCATION table.
Attribute.Name: Batch_Location_Key

Attribute.Description: The batch key that is associated with this batch location.
Attribute.Name: Batch_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the unique identifier of the location within a cart.
Attribute.Name: Cart_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: This field identifies the slot number within a cart location.
Attribute.Name: Slot_Number

Attribute.Description: The shipment key that is associated with this batch location.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment container key that is associated with this batch location.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Container_Key

Attribute.Description: The move request key that is associated with this batch location.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the unique identifier of a tote.
Attribute.Name: Tote_Id

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the user-defined execution exception codes.
Entity.Name: Execution_Exception

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_EXECUTION_EXCEPTION table.
Attribute.Name: Execution_Exception_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this execution exception.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the unique code of the user defined execution exception.
Attribute.Name: Exception_Code

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the short description of the user defined execution exception.
Attribute.Name: Exception_Short_Description

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the long description of the user defined execution exception.
Attribute.Name: Exception_Long_Description

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the execution exception types. Valid values are: PICK, DEPOSIT, and SKIP.
Attribute.Name: Exception_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the task should be held.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Task

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the source location is frozen for moving out the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Freeze_Source_For_Move_Out

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an alternate pick location is suggested. This is used when a pick exception encounters.
Attribute.Name: Suggested_Alternate_Pick_Location

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the target location is frozen for moving in the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Freeze_Target_For_Move_In

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an alternate deposit location should be suggested. This is used when a deposit exception is encountered.
Attribute.Name: Suggested_Alternate_Deposite_Location

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an alternate deposit location should be suggested from any zone as defined in putaway preferences.
Attribute.Name: Any_Zone_For_Alternate_Deposit

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the target location should be marked as full.
Attribute.Name: Mark_Target_As_Full

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the current task should be rejected.
Attribute.Name: Unassign_User

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the inventory status of the unavailable item quantity.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status_For_Unavailable_Qty

Attribute.Description: The flow key that is associated with this execution exception.
Attribute.Name: Flow_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to allow partial deposit of picked inventory at the suggested location. Valid values are Y and N. Default value is N.
Attribute.Name: Allow_Partial_Deposit

Attribute.Description: Check Digit is a numeric representation of Execution Exception. It is generally used by Voice Systems to verify the Execution Exception. Execution Exception Check Digit is unique for a Node.
Attribute.Name: Check_Digit

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores the tote id and the associated reference.
Entity.Name: Tote

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_TOTE table.
Attribute.Name: Tote_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the unique identifier of a tote.
Attribute.Name: Tote_Id

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this user zone.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the name of reference type that has been associated with the tote.
Attribute.Name: Reference_Name

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the value of reference type that has been associated with the tote.
Attribute.Name: Reference_Value

Attribute.Description: This key identifies the reference associated with the tote for the reference type.
Attribute.Name: Reference_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the cart id and its associated batch no. During the process of building a cart manually using mobile UI, a set of tasks are associated with a newly created batch. This table stores the cart along with the newly created batch.
Entity.Name: Cart

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CART table.
Attribute.Name: Cart_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the unique identifier of a cart.
Attribute.Name: Cart_Id

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this user zone.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: Identifies the newly created batch for the cart build process.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the maximum number of user allowed to work simultaneously in an aisle in the warehouse.
Entity.Name: Aisle_User_Constraint

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_AISLE_USER_CONSTRAINT table.
Attribute.Name: Aisle_User_Constraint_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with the aisle.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the aisle Number of the location. A zone could belong to multiple aisles and multiple zones could belong to an aisle. A location in a zone always belongs to one aisle and an aisle section always belong to one zone.
Attribute.Name: Aisle_Number

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the aisle section of the location.
Attribute.Name: Aisle_Suffix

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the maximum number of users to work simultaneously in the aisle.
Attribute.Name: Maximum_Users_Allowed

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table track the presence of user in an aisle in the warehouse.
Entity.Name: User_Aisle

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_USER_AISLE table.
Attribute.Name: User_Aisle_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with the aisle.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The login id of a user.
Attribute.Name: User_Id

Attribute.Description: A session is a series of interactions between two communication end points that occur during the span of a single connection. This field indicates the primary key of the YFS_User_Activity table where the identifier for the session used by the user is stored.
Attribute.Name: Session_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the aisle Number of the location. A zone could belong to multiple aisles and multiple zones could belong to an aisle. A location in a zone always belongs to one aisle and an aisle section always belong to one zone.
Attribute.Name: Aisle_Number

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the aisle section of the location.
Attribute.Name: Aisle_Suffix

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the zone to which a location belongs.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the unique identifier for the location.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the execution exception audits.
Entity.Name: Execution_Exception_Audit

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_EXECUTION_EXCEPTION_AUDIT table.
Attribute.Name: Execution_Exception_Audit_Key

Attribute.Description: The ship node's organization code.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The enterprise key that is associated with the task.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The one up number that uniquely identifies the task against which the exception is recorded.
Attribute.Name: Task_Id

Attribute.Description: The activity group of the task in context.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: The task type associated with the task in context.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the execution exception types. Valid values are: PICK, DEPOSIT, and SKIP.
Attribute.Name: Exception_Type

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the unique code of the user defined execution exception.
Attribute.Name: Exception_Code

Attribute.Description: The user who executed the exception.
Attribute.Name: User_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the task is held.
Attribute.Name: Is_Task_Held

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the task is skipped.
Attribute.Name: Is_Task_Skipped

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the source location is frozen for moving out the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Freeze_Source_For_Move_Out

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an alternate pick location is requested.
Attribute.Name: Suggest_Alternate_Pick_Location

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the target location is frozen for moving in the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Freeze_Target_For_Move_In

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an alternate deposit location is requested.
Attribute.Name: Suggest_Alternate_Deposit_Location

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the target location is marked as full.
Attribute.Name: Mark_Target_As_Full

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the current task is rejected.
Attribute.Name: Unassign_User

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether picked inventory is partially deposited at the suggested location.
Attribute.Name: Allow_Partial_Deposit

Attribute.Description: The original location from where inventory has to be picked up.
Attribute.Name: Original_Source_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The alternate pick location suggested.
Attribute.Name: Alternate_Pick_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The original location where inventory has to be deposited.
Attribute.Name: Original_Target_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The alternate deposit location suggested.
Attribute.Name: Alternate_Deposit_Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The quantity for which the task is created.
Attribute.Name: Original_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The quantity for which the exception is executed.
Attribute.Name: Exception_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the inventory status of the unavailable item quantity.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status_For_Unavailable_Qty

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores the external Voice Solution Application Definitions.
Entity.Name: Voice_Application

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_VOICE_APPLICATION table.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Application_Key

Attribute.Description: Unique Identifier of the External Voice Solution Application.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Application_Name

Attribute.Description: Description of the External Voice Solution Application.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: The Template xml contains all the Integration Parameters specific to the Voice Application.
Attribute.Name: Application_Instance_Template

Attribute.Description: Indicates if Voice Applcation is System Defined.
Attribute.Name: Is_System_Defined

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.

Entity.Name: Voice_Application_Instance

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_VOICE_APPLICATION_INSTANCE table.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Application_Instance_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the Voice Application of the Instance.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Application_Key

Attribute.Description: Unique Identifier of the Voice Application Instance.
Attribute.Name: Instance_Id

Attribute.Description: Description of the Voice Application Instance.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: This xml stores the Values of all the Parameters of the Voice Application Instance including Integration Parameters.
Attribute.Name: Application_Instance_Attributes

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.

Entity.Description: This table stores Voice Processes deployed on the Voice Application.
Entity.Name: Voice_Work_Flow

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_VOICE_WORK_FLOW table.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Work_Flow_Key

Attribute.Description: Unique Identifier of the Voice Work Flow Deployed.
Attribute.Name: Work_Flow_Id

Attribute.Description: Indicates the Voice Application on which the Work Flow is Deployed.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Application_Key

Attribute.Description: Description of the Voice Work Flow Deployed.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the Voice Work Flow is System Defined.
Attribute.Name: Is_System_Defined

Entity.Description: This table stores Voice Work Flow associations with different Activity Groups and Codes.
Entity.Name: Voice_Work_Flow_Activity_Association

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_VOICE_WORK_FLOW_ACT_ASSOC table.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Work_Flow_Activity_Association_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the Voice Workflow associated.
Attribute.Name: Voice_Work_Flow_Key

Attribute.Description: The Warehouse Activity Group that is associated to the Voice Work Flow. For example - OUTBOUND_PICKING, PUTAWAY.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: Indicates Specific Activity within the Associated Activity Group. For example - ItemPick,Storage.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Code

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the Voice Work Flow Activity Association is System Defined.
Attribute.Name: Is_System_Defined

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid
